cleaned_text: | Certified Personal Trainer and Yoga Instructor | Owner, Gloria Vaughn Fitness | Metabolic Reset Program Director [](https://ca.linkedin.com/company/functional-medicine-uptown?trk=public_post_reshare_feed-actor-image) 147 followers Meet Dr. Ben Snider, ND at [Functional Medicine Uptown](https://ca.linkedin.com/company/functional-medicine-uptown?trk=public_post_reshare-text) As a naturopathic doctor, Dr. Snider (also known as Dr. Ben within the clinic) has a strong passion for a new and evolving field called personalized medicine. Personalized medicine is a field that takes into account the whole person - including health measurements from genetic testing and functional lab diagnostics, as well as a thorough health history and physical exam. From this information a truly personalized protocol is developed which addresses the cause of the condition, not only the symptom. The world of medicine is transforming and we are entering a new frontier where it is now possible to search within your DNA to determine what exercise is most beneficial for your muscle type, what foods are most healing for you, and what form of vitamin is best.
